# Welcome to the main `*-docs-as-flashcards` repo (there are others)

Wondering what you're looking at exactly? [Click here to see the project's GitHub Pages site!](https://asa55.github.io/docs-as-flashcards/)

If you know why you're here and just want to download all flashcards in one single `.apkg` file, see the [you'll find a single `.zip` file containing every flashcard from every deck I have to offer in the Releases area of this repo](https://github.com/asa55/docs-as-flashcards/releases/).
